general.gigTitle: design, redesign, build, revamp wordpress website, wordpress website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: I Believe in Quality Work and Client Satisfaction
sellerCard.description:
Hey there, Are you looking for someone to create a professional WordPress site, an e-commerce website, a converting landing page, portfolio or any other business website, I've got you covered.  I'm Yan Mirza, your go-to expert for stunning websites that captivate and convert. I specialize in crafting powerful websites using the most renowned and widely used WordPress CMS. Your website will be user-friendly, neat and clean.

If you have any confusion about my service you can check my previous clients review on my profile.

Feel free to message me, Let's create something amazing together :)

description.content:
Do you want to design, redesign, build or develop wordpress website or landing page for your Business, E-commerce, agency, company or anything else? 


Then your wait is over!


I provide WordPress expertise, cost effective solutions and top-notch customer service at an affordable cost.


My portfolio includes a wide range of websites, such as landing pages, blogs, portfolio sites, sales pages, company, ecommerce, universities, physicians, medical, real state, yoga, gym and many more.


Service I will Provide :


  1. Fully functional website
  2. All pages creation
  3. Professional Design
  4. Product upload
  5. Woocommerce set
  6. Email Integration
  7. Google sitekit set
  8. Social Media
  9. Contact Form
  10. Chatbot
  11. Spam Protection
  12. Motion Effects
  13. Payment Gateway
  14. Seo Optimized
  15. Responsive Design
  16. Speed Optimize
  17. Security Setup
  18. And many more....


Why me :-


  1. Fully responsive.
  2. Premium Templates.
  3. Creative & modern design.
  4. Free Video tutorial.
  5. High-quality work but affordable price.
  6. Key functionalities to reach your goal.


If you still have any other confusion, You can check my previous client reviews on my profile :)


Feel free to message me with your requirements. Let's create an amazing website together!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What information do you need before we start our work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: 1. Content (number of pages, texts, images, and videos you want to use on your website) 2. Logo (Optional) 3. Address, Email, Social Links 4. Domain/Hosting details  5. Elementor pro

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide any support after the site is launched?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yeah!!! you will get support after completing your project!!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will the website be responsive(Mobile,Tab, Desktop)?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, the website will be completely responsive and will fit all screen sizes including cell phones, laptops, tablets, PCs and large screens.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I be sure that your delivery will make me satisfied?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: As I mention I give you unlimited revisions until you are completely happy with your final website. You will receive 100% up to your expectations.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be easily editable?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Your website will be fully editable. You can add texts, images, videos, create new pages and posts and E-commerce products, Edit the prices and descriptions of the products with no programming knowledge.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why should I choose you?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Because you are gonna get these from me:-

⏩ Responsive on all devices
⏩ Creative Design
⏩ Less Price But Quality work
⏩ Future Support
⏩ Quick Delivery
⏩ Premium template

openGraph.title: design, redesign, build, revamp wordpress website, wordpress website development

reviews.comment: Yan was an absolute pleasure to work with, this is the first website ive built and i had no idea what i wanted i spoke to 5 people before going with yan, most werent responsive or didnt put the effort to explain certain things in detail yan did, he was very responsive and went into great detail and even gave me examples of websites to help me figure out what style website i woud like ect.. he was quick and fast, im extremly happy i chose yan, he was great and i look forward to working with him on future projects!!!

seller_response.comment: Thank you Marc. Feel free to ask me if you need any help in future. Im here.

reviews.comment: Yan was extremely prompt and professional. I had a couple of additional edits and he addressed them straight away and worked with me to ensure my website was styled correctly and mobile responsive. Highly recommend working with him! Thank you for everything Yan!

seller_response.comment: Thank you Dan. It was great working with you.

reviews.comment: Yan is great!  He really elevated my site to the next level. I went with someone before him and was very unhappy. I’m glad I found Yan! Definitely using him again in the near future. Highly recommend!
I've enjoyed working with Yan. This is the 3rd website that he has worked on for me. He is really skilled at what he offers and goes above and beyond. I will use his services again. Highly recommend.

Working with Yan Mirza was an EXCEPTIONAL experience! His attention to detail and professionalism in website development truly exceeded my expectations. Yan's proactive communication and politeness made the process seamless—he really went above and beyond. 🤩

seller_response.comment: Thank You Elle. Im glad that you are satisfied. Best of luck with your business & Feel free to message me if you need any help. Im here✅
